title.rendered: The Wall-Hung Toilet in the Spotlight

content.rendered:
These commodes are stylish space-savers

You may have not put much thought into a toilet for your bathroom renovation, but don’t write it off as a no-thrills decision to make. There are a ton of toilets out there to choose from and they’re not all the same. Take wall-hung toilets—while they’re more challenging to install, they do serve as a space-saving solution for smaller bathrooms. To see how transformational wall-hung toilets can be, check out these seven examples.

Clean and Simple


(Image Credit: Jose Hevia, Design: Raul Sanchez Architects)

Au Naturel


(Image Credit: Andrew Burges Architects)

Scandinavian Chic


(Image Credit: Alvhem)

Modern Rustic


(Image Credit: Côté Maison)

Tile Takeover


(Image Credit: Via Elle)

Color Pop


(Image Credit: Cathy Pyle via Apartment Therapy)

—

Sweeten is a free service that matches renovators with vetted general contractors, helping until project completion. See the wall-hung toilet in Meredith and Jason’s modern bathroom.
